amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund for legislation that requires financial regulators to conduct rigorous cost-benefit analyses on all proposed rules.

vote.text: Amendment SA 340 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 52. Record Vote Number: 79.

action.text: Amendment SA 340 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Shelby.
